name: AudioVerse Alexa Skill
description:
Development of Alexa Skill for AudioVerse that allows to play the latest, trending and featured sermons from AudioVerse, also play sermons by speaker.

Commands:

Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play new sermons
Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play trending sermons
Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play featured sermons
Alexa, ask AudioVerse to play sermons by Mark Finley

Once is playing the skill allows to shuffle, next, previous, start over or ask to play sermons from a different speaker.
